txt.en:
'The Ashenslades has sadly become a home for a vicious pack of Wargs, which hampers our ability to explore the region in relative safety. Something must be done about them...they either ambush our patrols or report our positions to their Orc masters.

'Will you aid us by hunting these hunters? I believe they make their den in Naur-hoit, the ruins to the south of us.

'When you have slain a goodly number of the beasts, return to me.'
'With each of these foul beasts slain, the Ashenslades opens a little more for our exploration.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Hunt the foul Wargs that make their home in Naur-hoit, the ruins to the south of us.'
Naur-hoit, the ruins south of Mithechad, is home to a roving pack of Wargs.
The Wargs make their den in Naur-hoit, south of Mithechad.\n\nPerindúr has asked you to hunt down and defeat the Wargs of the Ashenslades.
Perindúr is at Mithechad, north of Naur-hoit.\n\nYou should return to Perindúr with news of your success against the Wargs of the Ashenslades.
